<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo">TelemetryInfo</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo">TelemetryInfo</a> is the data courier, used to move instrumented data from the tool being monitored to the Telemetry framework. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination">Destination</a></>}>
This class presents a data sink to which the Telemetry framework sends data. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager">Manager</a></>}>
This class is the main interaction point between any LLVM tool and this framework. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file provides the basic framework for Telemetry.

Refer to its documentation at llvm/docs/Telemetry.rst for more details.

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This stores configurations from both users and vendors and is passed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/config/#acac4c626f486b4521a9b4da6ad05e05e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;std::string&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/config/#acac4c626f486b4521a9b4da6ad05e05e">makeSessionId</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For isa, dyn&#95;cast, etc operations on TelemetryInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/telemetry/#ac13856b6a599c2b0252cbf171d9ec28c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/telemetry/#ac13856b6a599c2b0252cbf171d9ec28c">KindType</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This struct is used by TelemetryInfo to support isa&lt;&gt;, dyn&#95;cast&lt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is defined as a struct (rather than an enum) because it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expected to be extended by subclasses which may have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// additional TelemetryInfo types defined to describe different events.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/entrykind"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/entrykind">EntryKind</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/entrykind/#aa79d78c226c25ab33eef07a4a408486f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/telemetry/#ac13856b6a599c2b0252cbf171d9ec28c">KindType</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/entrykind/#aa79d78c226c25ab33eef07a4a408486f">Base</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TelemetryInfo is the data courier, used to move instrumented data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from the tool being monitored to the Telemetry framework.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This base class contains only the basic set of telemetry data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Downstream implementations can define more subclasses with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// additional fields to describe different events and concepts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For example, The LLDB debugger can define a DebugCommandInfo subclass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which has additional fields about the debug-command being instrumented,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// such as &#96;CommandArguments&#96; or &#96;CommandName&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#af1a8eea782090424fedcac0513543857">TelemetryInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This represents a unique-id, conventionally corresponding to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a tool&#39;s session - i.e., every time the tool starts until it exits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: a tool could have multiple sessions running at once, in which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case, these shall be multiple sets of TelemetryInfo with multiple unique</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IDs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Different usages can assign different types of IDs to this field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a9ebc2d2e608ab595fcd551abf8400d50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a9ebc2d2e608ab595fcd551abf8400d50">SessionId</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#af1a8eea782090424fedcac0513543857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#af1a8eea782090424fedcac0513543857">TelemetryInfo</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a6ef9537d81dfe57b5e7dec60c2c42df5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a6ef9537d81dfe57b5e7dec60c2c42df5">~TelemetryInfo</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a1e1886e108d758eabb15b73394b69a76">serialize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/serializer">Serializer</a> &amp;serializer) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For isa, dyn&#95;cast, etc, operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a3508eda368e6d583c0a7d45ff1d6c7a6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/telemetry/#ac13856b6a599c2b0252cbf171d9ec28c">KindType</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a3508eda368e6d583c0a7d45ff1d6c7a6">getKind</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/entrykind/#aa79d78c226c25ab33eef07a4a408486f">EntryKind::Base</a>; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a4414d70ef6cecd75915163d1c1133c66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#a4414d70ef6cecd75915163d1c1133c66">classof</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo/#af1a8eea782090424fedcac0513543857">TelemetryInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>-&gt;getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/entrykind/#aa79d78c226c25ab33eef07a4a408486f">EntryKind::Base</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class presents a data sink to which the Telemetry framework</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sends data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Its implementation is transparent to the framework.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is up to the vendor to decide which pieces of data to forward</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and where to forward them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination">Destination</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#aff50b19dcc63d97e30ff053583df56bc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#aff50b19dcc63d97e30ff053583df56bc">~Destination</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#a5dde1914c677f2f44f59bdb34ee98741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#a5dde1914c677f2f44f59bdb34ee98741">receiveEntry</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo">TelemetryInfo</a> &#42;Entry) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#abefa747fbe24542bc6a7e9de7ececdf5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/destination/#abefa747fbe24542bc6a7e9de7ececdf5">name</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class is the main interaction point between any LLVM tool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and this framework.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is responsible for collecting telemetry data from the tool being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// monitored and transmitting the data elsewhere.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager">Manager</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Optional callback for subclasses to perform additional tasks before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dispatching to Destinations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager/#a1059139755ac7a9bad30a9c24aae533f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/telemetry/manager/#a1059139755ac7a9bad30a9c24aae533f">preDispatch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/telemetry/telemetryinfo">TelemetryInfo</a> &#42;Entry) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Dispatch Telemetry data to the Destination(s).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The argument is non-const because the Manager may add or remove</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data from the entry.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
